presentation.name: Adams J. Contreras
presentation.description: Full Stack Developer with over 7 years of experience building scalable, high-performance web and mobile solutions.

about.title: About Me
about.intro: I'm Adams J. Contreras, a Venezuelan developer with over 7 years of experience in web technologies.
about.experience: My expertise spans both backend and frontend development, as well as mobile applications. I've worked as a Team Lead managing multicultural teams, always focused on results, delivery timelines, and code optimization.
about.passion: I'm passionate about creating efficient and scalable technology solutions, prioritizing best practices and the quality of the final product.
about.rolesValue: Full Stack Developer, Team Lead, Mobile Developer

skills.title: Technical Skills
skills.description: Comprehensive expertise across modern web technologies, mobile development, and cloud infrastructure

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.description: Enterprise-level applications and production-ready solutions showcasing full-stack expertise, scalable architecture, and industry best practices

simustream.title: SimuStream - Video Platform Backend
simustream.description: Production-grade video streaming platform with MongoDB, Express, Socket.io, Stripe payments, AWS S3 storage, player analytics, email notifications, referral system, and cron-based automation. Complete enterprise solution.

nextjs-strapi.title: Next.js 16 + Strapi CMS
nextjs-strapi.description: Full-stack application with Next.js 16 and Strapi 5, featuring JWT authentication, dynamic content management, protected routes, and server-side caching. Built with modern App Router architecture.

shopify-integration.title: Shopify Integration API
shopify-integration.description: Backend middleware connecting Shopify and Simustream platforms. Features automated webhook synchronization for products, OAuth authentication, Stripe integration, and HTTPS with SSL certificates.

video-player-monorepo.title: Video Player Monorepo
video-player-monorepo.description: Modular monorepo with multiple video player implementations using different architectures. Includes webpack-based player, shared component library, and lightweight jQuery player for various deployment scenarios.

fastapi-supabase.title: FastAPI + Supabase REST API
fastapi-supabase.description: Modern REST API with MVC architecture and 79% test coverage. Features complete CRUD operations, Pydantic validation, auto-generated Swagger docs, and PostgreSQL backend with Supabase.

angular-enterprise.title: Angular Enterprise Architecture
angular-enterprise.description: Scalable Angular 16 application demonstrating modular architecture with lazy loading, strict TypeScript configuration, comprehensive testing setup with Jasmine/Karma, and production-ready optimization.

mcp-ai-email.title: MCP AI Email Integration
mcp-ai-email.description: Model Context Protocol tool that bridges AI systems with email functionality, enabling intelligent email automation based on business logic. Built with TypeScript for seamless AI integration.

eslint-config.title: ESLint Config Package
eslint-config.description: Enterprise-grade ESLint configuration package published to npm for Strut Software and Rithm Software projects. Features modular configs for JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, RxJS with composable inheritance.

php-rest-api.title: PHP REST API with MySQL
php-rest-api.description: Professional REST API built with PHP 8 following MVC pattern. Features HTTP request logging, multilingual error handling, standardized JSON responses, and database-driven configuration.

ils-travel-insurance.title: ILS Travel Insurance Mobile App
ils-travel-insurance.description: Master mobile application for travel insurance management built with Ionic 6 and Angular 10. Features multi-client access, unified quoting system, real-time price calculations, SMS/email notifications, and multi-language support (ES/EN/PT). Production APK with native Cordova plugins.

travelkit-insurance.title: TravelKit Insurance Mobile App
travelkit-insurance.description: Cross-platform travel insurance application with Ionic and Angular. Integrates Authorize.net and PayPal payment gateways, features dynamic quote generation, payment form processing, and native mobile components. Includes internationalization and SMS notifications.

voyager-insurance.title: Voyager Insurance Mobile App
voyager-insurance.description: Mobile insurance quotation platform with advanced statistical dashboards and analytics. Built with Ionic 6 and Angular 10, featuring real-time calculations, email notifications, payment processing, and comprehensive reporting tools for travel insurance management.

contact.title: Let's Work Together
contact.description: I'm currently open to new opportunities and exciting projects. Let's connect and build something amazing!
contact.highlight1Description: of proven experience in full-stack development
contact.highlight2Description: with multicultural teams across time zones
contact.highlight3Description: approach with focus on delivery and optimization
contact.highlight4Description: in modern web and mobile technologies
